mapper.select: select city.city_id, city.city_name, city.city_update_time, city.city_state_id, city.city_province_id from city where city.city_delete_or_not=1 and city.city_id =#{cityId}

select city.city_id, city.city_name, city.city_update_time, city.city_state_id, city.city_province_id from city where city.city_delete_or_not=1 and city.city_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{cityName}), '%')
select city.city_id, city.city_name, city.city_update_time, city.city_state_id, city.city_province_id from city where city.city_delete_or_not=1
select city.city_id, city.city_name, city.city_update_time, city.city_state_id, city.city_province_id from city where city.city_delete_or_not=1 and city.city_state_id =#{cityStateId}
select city.city_id, city.city_name, city.city_update_time, city.city_state_id, city.city_province_id from city where city.city_delete_or_not=1 and city.city_province_id =#{provinceId}
